0.text: Bug 126632  Template label does not have id attribute in html output..

1.text: Overview Description: Template label with a value defined is not given an "id" attribute in html output.

2.text: The attached report (label.rptdesign) has a template label with the text "Template Label Text".

3.text: When the report is shown in the preview pane, the div tag containing the label text does not have an id attribute.

4.text: In contrast, the table tag has an id attribute with a unique id.

5.text: Steps to reproduce: Open attached report label.rptdesign.

7.text: View source for the resulting html page.

8.text: Actual results: div tag containing label text does not have an id attribute.

9.text: Expected results: div tag contaiing label text has a unique id attribute.
